verses.name: Psalms 51:6
verses.text: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.

verses.name: Psalms 51:7
verses.text: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.

verses.name: Psalms 51:8
verses.text: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.

verses.name: Psalms 51:9
verses.text: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.

verses.name: Psalms 51:10
verses.text: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.

verses.name: Psalms 51:11
verses.text: Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.
